options.content: Visit Community

targets.rawSql:
SELECT A.[AlarmID]
      ,AR.[Name] AS [Diagnostic Alarm Name]
      ,A.[AlarmDate]
	  ,AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] AS [Type]
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] A
JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[AlarmRule] AR ON A.[AlarmRuleID] = AR.[AlarmRuleID]
WHERE AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] = 'LogRhythm Diagnostics'
      AND A.[AlarmDate] >= DATEADD(DAY, -1, GETDATE());

SELECT A.[AlarmID]
      ,AR.[Name] AS [Diagnostic Alarm Name]
      ,A.[AlarmDate]
	  ,AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] AS [Type]
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] A
JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[AlarmRule] AR ON A.[AlarmRuleID] = AR.[AlarmRuleID]
WHERE AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] = 'LogRhythm Diagnostics'
      AND A.[AlarmDate] >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE());

USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), AlarmDate, 101) AS [Date],
    ISNULL(New, 0) + ISNULL(OpenAlarm, 0) + ISNULL(Working, 0) + ISNULL(Escalated, 0) + ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0) +
    ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) + ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(UnResolved, 0) + ISNULL(Reported, 0) + ISNULL(Monitor, 0) AS Total,
    ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0) + ISNULL(FalsePositive, 0) + ISNULL(Resolved, 0) + ISNULL(UnResolved, 0) +
    ISNULL(Reported, 0) + ISNULL(Monitor, 0) AS Closed
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            CONVERT(DATE, AlarmDate) AS AlarmDate,
            COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS AlarmCount,
            (CONVERT(NVARCHAR, CASE
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 0 THEN 'New'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 1 THEN 'OpenAlarm'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 2 THEN 'Working'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 3 THEN 'Escalated'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 4 THEN 'AutoClosed'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 5 THEN 'FalsePositive'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 6 THEN 'Resolved'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 7 THEN 'UnResolved'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 8 THEN 'Reported'
                WHEN AlarmStatus = 9 THEN 'Monitor' END)
            ) AS AlarmStatus
        FROM
            [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
            JOIN LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
        WHERE
            Alarm.AlarmDate BETWEEN GETDATE() - 6 AND GETDATE()
        GROUP BY
            AlarmDate, AlarmStatus
    ) d
PIVOT
    (
        SUM(AlarmCount)
        FOR AlarmStatus IN (New, OpenAlarm, Working, Escalated, AutoClosed, FalsePositive, Resolved, UnResolved, Reported, Monitor)
    ) piv;

select 
  $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d') AS time,
  [Logs Processed] = SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)),
  [Actual Logs Processed By AIEs] = SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)),
  [Logs Processed By AIEs] = 
    case 
      when SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)) = 0 THEN 0
      when SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)) <= SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)) THEN SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint))
      else SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint))
    end,
  [Events Forwarded By LMs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsForwarded as bigint)),
  [Events Forwarded By AIEs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsAIEngine as bigint)),
  [Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)
group by 
   $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d');

targets.query: SELECT mean(value) FROM "Transporter.LogsReceived" WHERE "host" =~ /LRS-ENG-CM/ AND "service" = 'transporter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "Transporter.LogsSent" WHERE "host" =~ /LRS-ENG-CM/ AND "service" = 'transporter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "Transporter.LogsIndexed" WHERE "host" =~ /LRS-ENG-CM/ AND "service" = 'transporter' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

targets.rawSql:
USE msdb;

SELECT
    job.name AS [Job Name],
    run.run_status AS [Run Status],
    run.run_date AS [Run Date],
    run.run_duration AS [Run Duration (HH:MM:SS)],
    run.message AS [Run Message]
FROM
    msdb.dbo.sysjobs job
    JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobhistory run ON job.job_id = run.job_id
WHERE
    run.run_status = 0 -- 0 represents failure
ORDER BY
    run.run_date DESC, job.name, run.run_duration;

SELECT A.[AlarmID]
      ,AR.[Name] AS [Diagnostic Alarm Name]
      ,A.[AlarmDate]
	  ,AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] AS [Type]
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] A
JOIN [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[AlarmRule] AR ON A.[AlarmRuleID] = AR.[AlarmRuleID]
WHERE AR.[AlarmRuleGroup] = 'LogRhythm Diagnostics';

USE [msdb];

 SELECT 
 case j.[enabled] 
		when 0 then 'Disabled'
		when 1 then 'Enabled'
		end as [Job Status],
     j.[name] AS [Job Name],
     s.[last_outcome_message] AS [Last Message],
	    
	CONVERT(int,s.last_run_date,101) as [Last Run Date], --(Issues with Conversion of date which is stored as INT)
	case s.last_run_outcome
		when 0 then 'Failed'
		when 1 then 'Successful'
		end as [Last Run Status]

  --    s.last_run_time as [Last Run Time]
 FROM [dbo].[sysjobs] AS j
 INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysjobservers] AS s ON s.[job_id] = j.[job_id]
 WHERE j.[enabled] = 1
 ORDER BY s.[last_run_date];

--select * from [dbo].[sysjobservers]
